entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
